companyName: The Law Offices of Randall D. Moore, PLLC - Fort Worth, TX

moreBlocks.lawyersAtTheLawOfficesOfRandallD.Moore,P: • Moore, Randall D. On a Super Lawyers® List

moreBlocks.articles:
• Trucking Accidents
    Many technical aspects are involved in truck accident investigations, requiring quick attention from an experienced attorney to preserve valuable evidence. Our firm has vigorously represented truck accident victims and protected their interests.
  • Trucking Accident Injuries
    Our firm understands the catastrophic injuries associated with truck accidents. Randall Moore has vigorously represented victims and their families. We are committed to helping victims obtain closure and justice.
  • Causes of Truck Accidents
    Mr. Moore understands the factors that lead to catastrophic trucking accidents. As a former tractor-trailer owner-operator, Randall Moore has knowledge of the equipment and people in the trucking industry from an inside perspective.
  • Oil & Gas Field Accidents
    If you have been injured in a natural gas or oilfield accident, our Fort Worth Texas law firm can help you with a claim for medical expenses, lost wages, and pain and suffering.
  • Commercial Litigation/Civil Litigation
    Our firm represents business owners that have been harmed or illegally taken advantage of by powerful corporations or the government.
  • "Governmental Immunity and Tort Liability", Texas Association of Defense Counsel, Spring, 1990
  • "Asserting Hospital Peer Review Privileges", State Bar Health Law Section Report, Fall, 1990
  • "Debunk the Junk: Attacking 'Junk Science", Texas Association of Defense Counsel, Spring, 1994
  • "Nursing Home Liability", Texas Association of Defense Counsel, Spring, 1997

description:
Representing Victims of Serious Personal Injury-and Standing Up for the Consumer, Small Business Owner and Those Wronged by Corporate Misconduct

Located in Fort Worth, Texas, the Law Offices of Randall D. Moore, PLLC, has been effectively providing our clients with successful outcomes for personal injury matters for more than 20 years. Focused exclusively on practicing personal injury law and protecting the rights of people who have been wronged by businesses and insurance companies, attorney Randall D. Moore has become one of the leading and most sought after lawyers for clients seeking results.

Attorney Randall D. Moore is not afraid to take a case to trial. As your lawyer, you can be confident that Mr. Moore will listen to your claim, thoroughly assess your options and aggressively pursue your case to achieve the best outcome possible. If you have been injured or feel as if you have been taken advantage of by a large entity, please take the time to contact the Law Offices of Randall D. Moore, PLLC, to discuss your case with a reputable and professional lawyer.

Randall D. Moore is a successful and accomplished attorney. He is board certified in personal injury trial law by the Texas Board of Legal Specialization, and board certified in civil trial by the National Board of Trial Advocacy. He was selected as one of Fort Worth's best lawyers in medical malpractice and he has achieved an "AV" rating*. In addition, since 2005, Mr. Moore has been named a Texas Super Lawyer, which is published in the Texas Monthly magazine. Lastly, attorney Randall D. Moore has also been named in the National Trial Lawyers Association Top 100 trial lawyers.

Protecting Injured Parties' Right to Full and Just Compensation in Texas

At the Law Offices of Randall D. Moore, PLLC, attorney Randall D. Moore handles personal injury matters including: automotive accidents (car accidents, motorcycle accidents and truck accidents), work-related accidents (construction accidents, explosions, and oil and gas field accidents), product and premises liability (slip-and-fall accidents, inadequate security and victims of sex crimes) and catastrophic injuries (burns, electrical shock and truck accident injuries). As an experienced trial lawyer, Mr. Moore may be able to get you full compensation for your injuries.

Experienced and Aggressive Attorney When It Matters Most

If you are looking for an experienced, aggressive and effective legal service, the Law Offices of Randall D. Moore, PLLC, can help you achieve the results you expect and desire. Please contact attorney Randall D. Moore today at 817-717-5245 or 866-497-9079 for a free consultation.

*CV, BV, and AV are registered certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards, and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the Bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories-legal ability and general ethical standards.
